item.description:
This concert has been postponed; new date TBD. Check back in soon to see if you might be able to come to the rescheduled concert!

---

Yeasayer is a psychedelic pop band from Brooklyn that you might (or already do) fancy. Saw them recently in Portland, ME and they were phenomenal. Come with me and swoon for Ira Wolf Tuton.

http://www.last.fm/music/Yeasayer

http://www.stubhub.com/yeasayer-tickets/yeasayer-boston-house-of-blues--boston--9-11-2012-4092903/

Let's meet up at the Lansdowne pub (9 Lansdowne Street) right beside the House of Blues around six or so and head over after.  I will send my contact information a few days before the show to everyone attending so you can find me and the group.
item.name: Yeasayer- *postponed*
